## StoreSerializeHelpers.getDocument() method

Retrieves a document from the store

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDocument(id: string): {
        plugin: K;
        state?: S;
    } | null;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                | Description        |
| --------- | ------------------- | ------------------ |
| id        | <code>string</code> | id of the document |

<b>Returns:</b>

`{ plugin: K; state?: S; } | null`
